Reviews.Title: Best Seller of V3xx on the Internet
Reviews.Author: Jim C.
Reviews.Content: This was the second phone I bought from this seller.  It was made for the ATT system and not "compatible", as other sellers advertise their products.  All ATT functions will work correctly with this phone.  The V3xx is the only V series Razr to come with 3G technology and it makes a huge difference in reception and transmission.  Couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: i was scared
Reviews.Author: Tristen Morris
Reviews.Content: i was nervous to buy this i wasnt sure how it would all work i talked to another buyer and he assured me it would all work out what to watch for etc....this phone was like new it made him so happy.....thank you so much....there wasnt 1 problem
